name: Avoid artifacts with a very low comment/code ratio (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all Methods, Functions & constructors with comment/code ratio below five percent. This parameter can be changed to suit the scenario.
output:
This report lists all Methods, Functions & constructors with very low comment/code ratio.

This QR provides the following information:
- Artifact full name
- Comment/code ratio
rationale: A very low comment/code ratio makes the source code difficult to read, maintain and test. It is highly recommended to keep this ratio at least five percent.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of artifacts with very low comment/code ratio.
